page.title: 07VILLAGE HALL, CALDER VALE
page.content:
The {Village Hall }is owned and run by the people of the village. It has recently had numerous improvements carried out together with a general facelift. A great deal of money has had to be raised for this mainly by the villagers and local people themselves. Many functions and events have been held by individuals or organisations to raise money.
The Hall is used for regular meetings of the Womens'Institute, a playgroup, as well as a doctor's surgery on several days each week, one of the Garstang doctors making the journey to the village. This is much appreciated, especially by the older folk who find difficulty travelling. The churches also use the hall for various social and fund raising activities.
